backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with user profiles, courses, mock tests, OTP, purchases, and access control state plus various validation and helper logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related components, affected files, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theming definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with favicon links, sitemap reference, Google verification, and script mounting root app.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap enumerating major public site pages with metadata for search engines.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, lazy-loaded pages, query client config, error boundary, and session/auth handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A memoized footer component showing brand info, social links, quick navigation buttons, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A memoized header with navigation buttons, branding, authentication controls, and a user dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: An OTP-based login modal handling mobile input, OTP sending and verification, connection states, and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/MobileLoginModal: A mobile-focused OTP login modal with two-step flow, countdown timer, error display, and clipboard OTP copy support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A profile setup modal allowing users to enter personal details, upload an avatar, and submit updates via backend API.
frontend/src/components/SignupModal.tsx: A deprecated signup modal simply notifying users to use mobile OTP login instead.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient and exposing identity state, login, and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileAuth.ts: Implements mobile OTP-based authentication with actor readiness checks, II login enforcement, retry logic, and connection state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, covering user profiles, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles with a red‑blue theme, dark mode variables, utility classes, animations, and UI enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard with tabs for users, mock tests, courses, syllabi, and Stripe settings, enforcing admin access via session state.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays all video courses grouped by subject with loading states and expandable video lists. Uses accent styling and memoized course cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero section, feature cards, and call‑to‑action buttons. Navigation varies based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MockTestsPage.tsx: Lists mock tests with subject filters and purchase flow via Stripe checkout. Handles loading, purchase state, and tabbed subject views.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a styled error card after a failed payment with actions to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows a success card after payment with navigation to mock tests, courses, or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and update profile info including name, photo upload with progress, and mobile validation. Syncs with backend profile APIs.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress metrics and charts using test results and progress queries, with brand-accented UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusPage.tsx: Fetches and displays syllabi with topic accordions, using brand-accented cards and loaders.
frontend/src/utils/accents.ts: Provides red/blue brand accent class helpers for cards, badges, buttons, tabs, metric cards, charts, and legacy mappings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining brand color safelist, theme extensions, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, issues, required assets, and build/deployment context for Exam Xpresss.
